program_title: State Bulk Fuel Revolving Loan Fund
program_description: This program helps state governments establish and support revolving loan funds for remote communities to purchase fuel in a more cost-effective way.
funds_usage: Funds can be used to capitalize a revolving loan fund that helps remote communities purchase bulk fuel.
eligible_rural_area_description: This program is for remote communities that aren't served by highways, railways, transit systems, or waterways.
getting_started_application_process: Applications for this program are accepted through our national office.
governing_document_1_name: The Rural Electrification Act of 1936, as amended in 7 U.S.C. 901
note_general_advice: Because information changes, always consult official program instructions or contact your local USDA Rural Development office for help.
note_equal_opportunity_statement: USDA is an equal opportunity provider, employer, and lender.
